price: 99. Motindami nyonso alekaki te sé akomisaki nsango ya maye totindaki ye nayango; Allah ayebi maye manso bomonisaka na maye bobombaka.
arabic: مَّا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُبۡدُونَ وَمَا تَكۡتُمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: mā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tub'dūna wamā taktumūna
